data.title: Reel Comedy Classics Professionally Duplicated DVD, Silent Movie on CCVideo.com.com
meta_keywords: harold lloyd one reel comedy classics
data.meta_description: Buy Harold Lloyd One-Reel Comedy Classics [DVD] [Professionally Duplicated DVD, Silent Movie] at CCVideo.com. Movies / TV: Comedy Video, Silent Films: 089218839091
data.text: The genius of this silent film era comic is clearly evidenced in this hilarious collection of eight of his classic film shorts. Includes The Non-Stop Kid (1918/12 min), Two-Gun Gussie (1918/8 min), The City Slicker (1918/12 min), I’m On My Way (1919/15 min), Spring Fever (1919/10 min), Just Neighbors (1919/9 min), Never Touched Me (1919/8 min) and Captain Kidd’s Kids (1919/20 min). B&w/NR/fullscreen.
